title: Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at lower center: Plan of Deck Saloon; instructions in graphite.
description: Plan for deck saloon on Lady Esther Yacht. Circular winding staircase in upper left corner; built-in bookshelves along north wall to right of staircase. Two tub chairs with circular end table at center in front of bookshelves. End table at end of bookshelves near upper right; curved sofa in upper right corner of room; circular coffee table in front of sofa. Bathroom on east wall, with entrance at lower right. Sink and toilet in upper portion of room; shower at center; large closet near south wall. Table, chair, and Capehart radio/phonograph along south wall at center, sofa at left, table and desk in far left corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lady Esther Yacht: Deck Saloon", ca. 1934–35.
ca. 1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-425.
